fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Build Fence (Night): Choose a type of fence to build tonight.
- Deploy Fence (Night): Choose a type of fence that you have built and, if necessary, a target. Your fence will be installed outside your target's house.
- Deconstruct (Night): Deconstruct your deployed fence. You will be able to redeploy it the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have three types of fences: Iron, Electric, and Spirit
- An Iron fence will grant your target Powerful defense. This fence collapses when your target is attacked.
- An Electric fence will prevent your target from visiting or being visited. This fence collapses when three visits have been prevented.
- A Spirit fence will prevent any actions that may negatively impact the Unseen from happening. This fence collapses once a negative action has been prevented.
- If the condition for a fence to collapse is met, it will collapse at the end of the night after all other actions resolve.
- You may have up to two fences built and/or placed at any time.
